Create a virtual reality experience that transports users to a fantastical world of ice cream.
Develop a line of artisanal ice cream flavors inspired by distant planets and celestial bodies.
Design an ice cream shop that resembles a space station or spaceship, complete with zero-gravity ice cream cones and galactic decor.
Create an ice cream-themed escape room where players must solve puzzles to unlock new flavors and escape the frozen planet.
Develop a mobile app that uses augmented reality to transport users to different planets and moons in our solar system, each with its own unique ice cream flavor.
